title: Calories in 1/4 Cup of Walnuts
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 4 cup of walnuts, including fat, protein, carbs, fiber, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Raw, shelled English walnuts, chopped; approximately 28 g per 1/4 cup serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by walnut variety, freshness, processing, and portion measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1/4 cup of walnuts provides ~185 kcal, mostly from healthy fats, with 4 g protein and 2 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Chopped and mixed with raisins (1 tbsp)

faqs.q: How many calories in 1/4 cup walnuts?
faqs.a: Approximately 185 kcal for 1/4 cup (28 g) raw walnuts.
Yes, about 18.5 g total fat per 1/4 cup, mostly unsaturated healthy fats.

faqs.q: How much protein in 1/4 cup of walnuts?

faqs.a: Yes, about 1.9 g dietary fiber per 1/4 cup, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Is 1/4 cup the standard walnut serving?
faqs.a: Yes, often recommended as a handful or 1 oz for snacks; adjust for dietary needs.
